text:
saqmidha#M ~MyakShyagnE | 
prati# tE jiqhvA GRuqtamucca#raNyEth samuqdrE tEq hRuda#yamaqPsva#ntaH | 
saM tvA# viSaqntvOSha#dhI-ruqtA&&pO# yaqj~jasya# tvA yaj~japatE haqvirBi#H | 
sUqktaqvAqkE na#mOvAqkE vi#dhEqmA&va#BRutha ni ca~gkuNa nicEqrura#si ni 
ca~gkuqNA&va# dEqvairdEqva-kRu#taqmEnO#&yAqDavaq martyaiqrmartya#-kRutamuqrOrA nO# dEva riqShaspA#hi sumiqtrA naq Apaq OSha#dhayaH - [  ] 50
